messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Cryptic Crescent Conundrum DATE: 04/04/04 The courtroom was a hive of activity as the trial proceeded. The defense introduced the officers pivotal to the investigation to expound on their observations. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Lieutenant A. B. Allen, the lead investigator for this case. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Thank you, Lieutenant Allen. Can you detail the circumstances on the day the conundrum was unearthed? WITNESS: Certainly. On the afternoon of February 2nd, Officer C. D. Drake found a cryptic scenario at the Crescent area and alerted the team. The investigation ensued immediately. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Who was responsible for the evidence assessment? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Foster and Technician G. H. Green were in charge of assessing and analyzing the evidence. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Who conducted the main interrogations? WITNESS: Detective I. J. Jenkins and Detective K. L. Lewis managed the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Thank you. No further queries. The Prosecution cross-examined Lieutenant Allen extensively about the investigative methods. During the trial, Patrol Officer M. N. Nelson, Patrol Officer O. P. Perez, and Patrol Officer Q. R. Reed were also brought to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lieutenant A. B. Allen 
Officer Context: Lieutenant Allen is the lead investigator in the Cryptic Crescent Conundrum case, detailing the circumstances on the day the conundrum was unearthed during the trial. 
Officer Role: Lieutenant 

Officer Name: Officer C. D. Drake 
Officer Context: Officer Drake discovered a cryptic scenario at the Crescent area on the afternoon of February 2nd, which initiated the investigation. 
Officer Role: Officer 

Officer Name: Sergeant E. F. Foster 
Officer Context: Sergeant Foster, alongside Technician G. H. Green, was responsible for assessing and analyzing the evidence related to the case. 
Officer Role: Sergeant 

Officer Name: Technician G. H. Green 
Officer Context: Technician Green worked with Sergeant E. F. Foster on assessing and analyzing the evidence concerning the cryptic scenario at the Crescent area. 
Officer Role: Technician 

Officer Name: Detective I. J. Jenkins 
Officer Context: Detective Jenkins, alongside Detective K. L. Lewis, managed the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses to gather more information regarding the conundrum. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective K. L. Lewis 
Officer Context: Detective Lewis, along with Detective I. J. Jenkins, conducted the main interrogations to collect additional information about the incident. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer M. N. Nelson 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Nelson was called to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer O. P. Perez 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Perez was also summoned to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer Q. R. Reed 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Reed was brought to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer
